Description of incident: "Kaiser Permanente is notifying some 600 member from Riverside and "surrounding areas" by mail about a patient data breach of names, medical record numbers and procedures, but no other indentifying informaiton, according to a news release. The breach was detected Aug. 9 when a list of information was "inadvertently sent to an unintended email address," the statement noted.  The information did not include Social Security numbers, financial information or other member information."
